thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com | 7 of 29
thread.title: Amanda Oleander

author: Amanda Oleander
title: Amanda Oleander
text: I love everything about coming here. The staff is always so friendly and helpful, the laser hair removal is painless and I am seeing huge results already. I just finished having my fourth session and I see huge results, I used to get bumps from in grown hairs and now they have done away dramatically. I used to also get razor burn when I shaved and I no longer get it. I'm very happy with the procedure. I also live-stream it for people with any questions to see. I was very hesitant before getting laser hair removal because I thought it would hurt too much or wouldn't work. If you want to see the procedure live you can @amandaoleander on Periscope. Feel free to ask me or the nurse any questions.
